archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Receive Port Out Request
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The Receive Port Out Request is responsible for receiving and process Port Out requests issued by a third CSP.

properties.value: The Receive Port Out Request is responsible for receiving and process Port Out requests issued by a third CSP through the Number Portability Clearinghouse. The process allows a customer to port his/her number to a third CSP. Responsibilities of these processes include, but are not limited to: â€¢Â Â Â Â Receiving Port Out request â€¢Â Â Â Â Accepting or Rejecting Port Out request â€¢Â Â Â Â Adding additional information toÂ Port Out request â€¢Â Â Â Â ManagingÂ Port Out communication flow with Number Portability Clearinghouse
